Survival Tools V1.1 Update (March 2019)
===========================================

Thank you for purchasing this item, included in this set should be the following:

(Notes: This product uses the Unity Standard Shaders, populate your scene using the prefabs folder)
     

	-9 Assets
	-9 Prefabs
	-32 2048x2048 textures
	-1 Scene

	POLY COUNTS:
	Battery: 715 verts, 754 tris
	Cannedfood: 462 verts, 756 tris
	Firstaid: 373 verts, 554 tris
	Flashlight: 906 verts, 1424 tris
	Matchbox: Box(93 verts, 132 tris) Matches (530 verts, 820 tris)
	Pills: 630 verts, 608 tris
	Tape: 424 verts, 636 tris
	Walkie: 1657 verts, 2772 tris
	Waterbottle: 944 verts, 1336 tris
